pullrequest.title: Proposal: Updating to Visual Studio 2017 and improving Windows CI

content.raw:
Another way to ask this is, do we want to support 32 bits? I think we should only support 64 bits, and more specifically target Windows 10 (and up). The only way a user could end up with a 32bit OS on Windows 10 is if they upgraded from a 32-bit version of Windows 7 or 8. 

The impact of supporting only 64 bits seems minimal.
